comments: I have heard that he\'s a good professor. But his online section this last semester has been terrible. New online section and very little attention paid to teaching, more on the grading. He isn\'t too tough of a grader if you really show you care, but its hard to do that online. I do not recommend if you care about a pretty GPA.

comments: Such a great teacher! Absolutely amazing and so interested in actually teaching the students. Attendance was only mandatory when there were the group presentations at the end and there were some articles we had to write about . Easy class as long as you keep up on your work.

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: Outstanding depth of knowledge of the subject matter. Lectures were well structured, interesting and used many \'real world\' examples. Professor Marra encourages interesting in class debate and discussion and he boils down concepts into easily understandable terms. This class, with this Professor, is a must for any serious business student.

comments: He is a nice professor.He helps students with all questions carefully. You don\'t have to attend every class if you know how to do your homework. I definitely recommend you to take this course. It\'s a easy A class.

LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: He is so helpful & caring! Classes were not mandatory. I had class Tues&Thurs and Thursdays were a lab for excel help. 3 Excel Homeworks to hand in at the end of the semester which were very easy as long as you have the required workbook & two open book exams. He made lectures fun & relatable. Overall an amazing guy & easy class.
